channel.title: Risks (and Benefits) of Generative AI and Large Language Models
channel.description: Recent content on Risks (and Benefits) of Generative AI and Large Language Models

item.title: Welcome to the LLM Risks Seminar
item.author: evans@virginia.edu (David Evans)
item.description: Full Transcript Seminar Plan The actual seminar won’t be fully planned by GPT-4, but more information on it won’t be available until later. I’m expecting the structure and format to be similar to this seminar, but with a topic focused on learning as much as we can about the potential for both good and harm from generative AI (including large language models) and things we can do (mostly technically, but including policy) to mitigate the harms.
